articles.title: Gravitas: Cellphone creator Martin Cooper regrets invention? - WION
articles.description: It has been 50 years since cell phones were invented. Today's smartphones pack more tech than initial NASA's Voyager I, Apollo 11 computers, Orion spaceship, etc. Are cell phones the greatest invention since the wheel? Molly Gambhir reports.

articles.title: BlackRock, Invesco mark down Byju’s, Swiggy holdings as tech valuations correct - The Economic Times
articles.description: While BlackRock has slashed Byjus valuation by nearly 50%, Invesco has cut Swiggys stake value by over 23%.
articles.content: US investors marked down the value of their holdings in Byjus and Swiggy last year, according to recent US filings. BlackRock slashed the value of its investment in Byjus by nearly 50%, while Invesco… [+5538 chars]
